DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates the safety and efficacy of brimonidine 0.1% ophthalmic solution compared with brimonidine 0.2% ophthalmic solution in patients with glaucoma or ocular hypertension
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Brimonidine in Patients With Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Ocular hypertension or glaucoma in both eyes Uncontrolled systemic disease Known allergy or sensitivity to brimonidine
